snippet: At Chicago's Harper High School, 29 current or former students were shot last year. "This American Life" spent five months at the school, and begins a two-part special report this weekend.
abstract: At Chicago's Harper High School, 29 current or former students were shot last year. "This American Life" spent five months at the school, and begins a two-part special report this weekend.

headline.main: 'This American Life' Looks at a High School Marooned in Violence
